title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course provides a foundational understanding of C programming, covering syntax, data types, and essential algorithms for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore fundamental algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving techniques to enhance your computational problem-solving skills. Dive in today!

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Learn C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms for effective problem-solving.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Build a strong foundation in essential data structures, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues for effective programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Learn object-oriented programming principles and Python language features for building efficient, modular, and reusable code.

title: Software Engineering
details: Master the art of designing, developing, and maintaining robust software systems, from requirements analysis to deployment and maintenance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Gain expertise in Amazon Web Services and cloud technology, covering infrastructure, services, and scalability.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn MySQL database management, design, and querying for efficient data storage and retrieval in various applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Develop critical thinking, analytical skills, and creative strategies to solve complex challenges in various domains effectively.
